title: [Self-Directed] Library Information Utilization Education for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Scientific Theories and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Task-centered training for in-service professionals to effectively search for and utilize science information required in their job roles.

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three credible sources related to science topics using academic databases within four weeks
Learners can construct references needed for practical tasks by integrating library online catalogs and internet resources
Learners can effectively select evidence-based materials for drafting science practical reports based on information retrieval results

resources: Access to Science Domain Academic Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
